title: Internet connection keeps cutting out?
body: Hello I just downloaded the game after not playing for a few years. I noticed when I installed the game it crashed my wifi connection. Now my wifi keeps cutting out and then reconnecting anywhere between 1 minute to 3 minutes at time. The game is is not even open on my computer right now. I unchecked peer to peer review, restarted my computer and my modem but it's still cutting out. I know it's not my laptop because my cellphone is also losing its connection. Everything was fine until I installed the game is anyone else having this problem?

replies.body: I am having the same problem. keeps freezing my internet. I had to reinstall the game because I got a new hard drive. I just disconnect and reconnect to the internet and it fixes it but it happens every 2 minutes. Pretty annoying.

Since your phone is disconnecting from your network, it sounds like this is happening at your modem/router. I strongly recommend reaching out to your ISP's technical support team so they can assist you with troubleshooting your equipment.

Let me know if you have any questions.
